text: Mario Bros. is a video game made in 1983. It is the first game to feature Luigi as a playable character as well as the first game in which Mario is named Mario; in Donkey Kong, Mario was called "Jumpman". It was later remade for other game consoles at the time. Mario Bros. was also included with the four Super Mario Advance games and Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga. ==Gameplay== In the game, Mario and Luigi must defeat enemies by jumping on them from below and then kicking them when they are knocked down. ==References== Category:1983 video games Category:Amstrad CPC games Category:Arcade games Category:Atari 2600 games Category:Atari 5200 games Category:Atari video games Category:Commodore 64 games Category:Cooperative video games Category:Famicom Disk System games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:Intelligent Systems games Category:Mario platform games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Nintendo Entertainment System games Category:Nintendo Research & Development 1 games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:Platform games Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Virtual Console games Category:Virtual Console games for Wii U Category:ZX Spectrum games
